title: Looney Tunes: Wacky World of Sports
description: Play against your friends featuring 4 classic sports: Basketball , Soccer, Golf and Tennis. Avoid the wacky obstacles and gain power-ups to incite chaos against your friends and family as you control your favorite Looney Tunes character. Play your way in this 4-player local co-op sports arcade game and choose the character that best suits your play style. Zoochosis

system_requirements.Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.7 GHz or higher
